title: The Grudge
description: Andrea Canning speaks with U.S. District Court Judge Esther Salas about the deadly shooting at her home in 2020 that killed her son Daniel and critically injured her husband Mark.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
